description: Ximena migrated to Australia in 2003. To migrate is to be born again. While enjoying her new life in Australia, she looks back at the friendships and life she left behind in Buenos Aires. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with the Jewish Museum of Australia
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2000983; Stories from the Jewish Community; Active; 2007
